title: Scrub Meadow
description: A grassy meadow punctuated by shrub and scrub. Lush, green grasses wave gently in the wind. The grasses range in height from less than a meter to nearly two meters tall in places. Small shrubs and stunted trees poke out of the grasses sporadically. The land is gently sloped up to the north, flat to the east, gently sloped down to the south, gently sloped down to the west.
